sentences.sContent: ...technologies which will allow us to get much higher throughput.
sentences.sCn: ...能让我们大幅提高产量的技术。

phrases.pCn: 生产能力，生产量；总处理能力

remMethod.val: through(从头到尾) + put(产量) → 生产量

trans.tranOther: The throughput of an organization or system is the amount of things it can do or deal with in a particular period of time
